name: Kalash Kankaria
title: Machine Learning Engineer

highlights: Developed and deployed ML models serving production traffic
Improved model performance through feature engineering and optimization
Built end-to-end MLOps pipelines for automated deployment
Collaborated with cross-functional teams on AI initiatives
Built predictive models for business optimization
Analyzed large datasets to extract actionable insights
Developed automated reporting and monitoring systems
